title: Undone by Ben Moor - Series 1 + 2 - BBC Radio Sci-Fi - SeymourDA
description:
UNDONE by Ben Moor.

Both series of Ben Moor\\\&#039;s joyously funny science-fiction comedy.

Would-be journalist Edna Turner (Sarah Solemani in Series One and Alex Tregear in Series Two) comes to London to work on the listings magazine \\\"Get Out!\\\".

Here she encounters Tankerton Slopes (Ben Moor) who comes from a parallel version of London called Undone. Undone is \\\"where the weirdness comes from\\\" and ideas leak from Undone to London, making it the peculiar place it is.

Tankerton recruits Edna to help find residents of Undone who have crossed to London bringing the weirdness with them, and send them back where they came from.

But if strange is good, could it really hurt if Edna let just one slip though the net?

Series One - Five half-hour episodes 2006

1. Mind The Gaps
2. Unappreciated
3. Unrivalled
4. Unfamiliar
5. Unravelled

Series Two - Six half-hour episodes 2008

1. Unaccompanied
2. Unsurprised
3. Unrelated
4. Unaccustomed
5. Unwelcome
6. Unification

Both series are my recordings from BBC7 at 128kbps ABR joint-stereo LAME mp3.

Freeview -> DVD Recorder -> MP3.
